channel.title: Runescape Wilderness & Free Trade!
channel.description:
Listen FIRST.
I understand a previous topic was made earlier, but I also had a entertaining question that I would like as along with it.
First off, please go vote. These are the days now when we don't have to play 317's because we miss the free trade, and the wilderness and the true beauty of runescape that comes along with it.
Go vote www.runescape.com/wilderness All you need to do is enter a valid username. Hell, make 5 accounts and vote on all of them.
My question to you, fellow Moparscapians, is even if it isn't a full conversion, which I don't think would ever be possible. What if they decide to put a number of limited worlds where it would be just the same as the old runescape. Do you think this would be a possibility, what would they have to change in order for this to happen. And how many worlds do you think would be sufficient.
- 4 2 0

item.title: Runescape Wilderness & Free Trade!
item.description:
@4_2_0 wrote:

Listen FIRST.

I understand a previous topic was made earlier, but I also had a entertaining question that I would like as along with it.

First off, please go vote. These are the days now when we don’t have to play 317’s because we miss the free trade, and the wilderness and the true beauty of runescape that comes along with it.

Go vote www.runescape.com/wilderness All you need to do is enter a valid username. Hell, make 5 accounts and vote on all of them.

My question to you, fellow Moparscapians, is even if it isn’t a full conversion, which I don’t think would ever be possible. What if they decide to put a number of limited worlds where it would be just the same as the old runescape. Do you think this would be a possibility, what would they have to change in order for this to happen. And how many worlds do you think would be sufficient.
